overview: The film companion to the 2017 album of the same name by British musician Bibio
tagline: I donâ€™t believe in ghosts but I do believe places can be haunted by meaning. Places change, not always for the better and not always by natural, benevolent or politically sound means. A place can be charged with atmosphere because of what it has been through or what it has been.
title: Phantom Brickworks
